home.invitation: Are you ready to join the challenge of participating in the greatest blockchain hackathon in Latin America?

card1.title: 48 HOURS OF HACKATHON
card1.firstTextContent: Join us for this event that will be on another level, it will be two days of hacking where disruptive ideas and innovative solutions to real problems will be generated through Blockchain technology. Challenge yourself with this great event, where you will be working hand by hand with the best blockchain developers in the industry.
card1.secondTextContent: Come and enjoy drinks and food while connecting with the brightest minds in the ecosystem.

card2.title: Who?
card2.firstTextContent: We seek that people from different industries and contexts converge in the same space and this generates an environment conducive to the generation of disruptive ideas and innovative solutions.
card2.secondTextContent: The main goal of the project is that the best ideas can be hatched and developed.

ticketCard.title: GET YOUR TICKET
ticketCard.textContent: Don't wait anymore and get your ticket to now!

faqSection.title: Do you have questions about the hackathon?
faqSection.subtitle: Here you will find the answers

faq1.question: What is Dotlabs(Medellín)?
faq1.answer: Dotlabs(Medellín) is a hackathon focused on product, solution or protocol development based on Ethereum and all the projects that use it.

faq2.question: What is Dotlabs()?
faq2.answer: Dotlabs() is a developers community. We're a team that shares knowlegde, experiences and great moments.

faq3.question: When and where is going to occur The Dotlabs(Medellín)?

faq4.question: What is Solidity?
faq4.answer: Solidity is a Smart Contracts oriented programming language. It's compatible with EVM and the entire Ethereum ecosystem.

faq6.question: What profiles and skills are we looking for?
faq6.answer:
We look for developers with good ideas and eager to learn, that have some crypto knowledge and want to connect with leaders of the crypto and blockchain industry.
 You got extra points if you've got knowledge of the user-facing crypto market and know several programming languages (Solidity, Rust, JavaScript and Python have the advantage).

faq7.question: What opportunities and benefits will I have by participating on this hackathon?
faq7.answer: You'll be able to network with the field's leaders, know an ecosystem in constant growing and develop your idea in a safe and fun space while eating pizza.

faq8.question: Where can I know more?
faq8.answer: If you are a developer and have never heard of Solidity, Rust or Dotlabs(), just look at the top of the page for our socials.

faq11.question: Where can I keep up to date with the news from Dotlabs() hackathon?
faq11.answer: To keep up to date with our news let's check it out the top of the site for our socials.

mapSection.title: Don't get lost!
mapSection.textContent: The hackathon will take place in a unique location specially designed for this event! Through Google Maps, you will be able to see in detail the location of the event and get directions to the venue. Don't miss this unique opportunity to participate in the hackhaton in the perfect place, we are waiting for you there!

footer.description: Dotlabs() is a non-profit community, where Web3 is taught to anyone who is interested in writing the future of the internet.
